strings.evolution:
To thank you for this power
you have bestowed upon me.
I dedicate my life to you.
strings.affinity:
It is my honor to repay you
for all you have shared with me
in our journey together.
strings.description: Known as a samurai, she wields her blade out of loyalty for her master. She lived in accordance to the samurai code, and even after retiring she taught it to her children. However, after her daughter was taken in by the darkness, she left her family and master behind, instead deciding to take her own life by committing seppuku.
strings.fusion: I promise I will pay back the favor you did for me when you gave me power.
strings.summon:
Master...
Please, my blade,
use it as you will.

strings.affinity:
It is my honor to repay you
for all you have shared with me
in our journey together.
strings.description: A samurai who valued loyalty and decorum, and wielded her blade only in service to her master. Chizuru and her fellow samurai, honorable warriors of great pride not unlike the knights of today, are occasionally referenced in historical chronicles, but specific details of the time period in which they lived and the lands from which they hailed are scarce.
strings.fusion:
Master, I am grateful
for the power you
bestow upon me.
strings.summon:
You must be my new master.
My body shall be your sword
and shield.

strings.evolution:
This power is a gift from my master.
I shall prove myself worthy
by devoting myself to my training.
strings.affinity:
It is my honor to repay you
for all you have shared with me
in our journey together.
strings.description: A katana-wielding samurai of great strength who served her master with undying loyalty by cultivating both body and spirit. After Chizuru retired from her duties, she married a ninja who served the same lord, and gave birth to both a son and a daughter. Sadly, due to strife within her clan, she lost her daughter to the shadows, filling her with grief until the end of her days.
strings.fusion:
You grant me still more power, master?
Then I shall devote myself
to you fully.
strings.summon:
Master, I hope my skills with
the sword prove useful to you.
